title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department foreign affair trade) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Fiona Campbell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Fiona Campbell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade, is appointed to be a 
Special Adviser to Neale Richmond, Minister of State at the Department of 
Foreign Affairs and Trade with effect from 29 January 2025 to 31 March 2025.
text_norm: 2 fiona campbell particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair trade appointed special adviser neale richmond minister state department foreign affair trade effect 29 january 2025 31 march 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 3. Nick Lee, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the offices
text_raw:
3. Nick Lee, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the offices 
of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to Neale Richmond, Minister of State at the Department of Foreign 
Affairs and Trade with effect from 1 April 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 June, 2025. 

MICHEAL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [337] 3
